### Source[30DCC by tessaeagle] (https://github.com/tessaeagle/30daychartchallenge/blob/main/Code/Day_1.R)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
df <- tibble(date = seq(mdy("06/01/2021"),
                        mdy("06/30/2021"),
                        "days"))

df_june <- df %>% 
  mutate(weekday = wday(date, label = T, 
                        week_start = 7),
         month = month(date, label = T),
         date1 = yday(date),
         week = epiweek(date)) %>% 
  mutate(group = case_when(date == "2021-06-01" ~ "0",
                           date > "2021-06-01" ~ "1"),
          group = as.factor(group))



plot <- df_june %>% 
  ggplot(aes(weekday, -week, fill = group)) +
  geom_tile(color = "white",
            size = .3, 
            show.legend = F) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#fcba03", "#d4d5cd")) +
  labs(title = "30 Day Chart Challenge",
       subtitle = "June 2021",
       caption = "Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(axis.text.x.bottom = element_text(size = 11,
                                          color = "#314757",),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20,
                                  color = "#314757",
                                  face = "bold",
                                  hjust = .5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 16,
                                     color = "#314757",
                                     hjust = .5,
                                     margin = margin(t = .05)),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 9,
                                    color = "#b1bab3",
                                    hjust = 1)) 

 ggsave(here::here("day1", "day1_part_to_whole.png"), width = 7, height = 5, units = "cm")
```
